answers.answer: Try not to do a whole lot on your feet drinks lots of water and lay on your left side while keeping feet elevated. I had it and it led to preeclampsia which was an early delivery at 36 weeks. If you can't control it Drs could put you on hospital bed rest which *****. Good luck

question: doctor said I have hight blood pressure it was at 140 . What can I do to bring it down? I am 25 weeks pregnant
title: High blood pressure
